data.title: Nelly Furtado - Songs, Events and Music Stats
data.meta_description: Nelly Furtado: Listen to new and popular songs, find events, look into their stats and see who their fans are.
data.text:
Nelly Furtado is a well-known performer in the mainstream pop field and is a native of Victoria, British Columbia. Furtado's work, which combines pop, hip hop, folk, and world music, reflects her varied cultural background and musical influences.

She has received many honors, including a Grammy Award and several other nominations, for her unusual voice and songwriting abilities. With singles like "I'm Like a Bird," "Promiscuous," and "Say It Right" ruling the charts, her music has found an audience all over the world.

Furtado has managed to stay relevant in the ever-evolving musical world because to her capacity to imbue her music with emotion and raw intensity. Inspiring her listeners to accept their uniqueness and take charge of their life, her music exudes a sense of empowerment. Future generations of pop performers will surely be influenced by Nelly Furtado's contributions to the genre, which have elevated her to the status of an industry icon.

Canadian vocalist Nelly Furtado has established herself in the pop music world. Some of her most well-known songs include "Promiscuous," "Say It Right," and "Give It To Me." Her music has found a home with listeners all around the world. These tracks exhibit Nelly Furtado's distinctive sound and her propensity for writing upbeat, danceable music.

One of Nelly Furtado's most well-known songs is "Promiscuous". It was released in 2006 and features Timbaland. It became a huge success right away, topping the charts in several different nations. The song is a favorite at parties and clubs because of its energetic tempo and memorable lyrics.

"Say It Right" is another one of Nelly Furtado's well-liked songs. When this song was released in 2007, it instantly gained popularity. Nelly Furtado's vocal range and narrative skills are highlighted by the song's soothing tune and stirring lyrics. The song is still played on radio stations all over the world and has subsequently established itself as a mainstay in the mainstream music scene.

"Broken Strings," "Maneater," and "Turn Off The Light" are some of Nelly Furtado's other well-known songs. These tracks highlight Nelly Furtado's range as a performer and her talent for writing songs that connect with listeners all around the world. Overall, Nelly Furtado's music is a reflection of her brilliance and distinctive style, therefore it is understandable why she has gained such a cult following in the pop music community.

The Canadian singer-songwriter Nelly Furtado has been causing a stir in the music business with her most recent album, "Loose (Expanded Edition) (2021)". The album showcases Furtado's range and innovation with a blend of pop, R&B, and hip-hop elements. Her critically acclaimed and commercially successful smash singles, including "Maneater," "Promiscuous," and "All Good Things (Come To An End) [Nelly Furtado x Quarterhead] (2021), are all featured on the album.

"Eat Your Man (with Nelly Furtado) (2023)," Furtado's most recent track, is a duet with another artist and is expected to extend her string of number-one singles. The song highlights Furtado's distinctive vocal style and her aptitude at flawlessly fusing many genres. Both fans and critics like her previous song, "Say It Right (Sped Up Remix) (2022)".

2017 saw Furtado's "The Ride" album, which examines themes of love, loss, and self-discovery, come to light. The album's blend of pop, rock, and electronic elements demonstrates Furtado's artistic development. Hit singles from the album including "Pipe Dreams" and "Flatline" have brought her both critical acclaim and financial success.

Overall, Nelly Furtado's most recent songs and albums of music continue to highlight her artistic range and innovation. Furtado has solidified her position as one of Canada's most adored performers with her distinctive fusion of pop, R&B, and hip-hop sounds.

Throughout her career, Canadian pop diva Nelly Furtado has played a number of illustrious events and venues. At the Machaca Festival in Mexico City, she gave one of her most memorable performances in front of a sizable audience of devoted admirers. Her energetic performance and strong vocals made a big impression on the crowd.

She made another major festival appearance at Australia's Beyond The Valley Festival, where she played some of her most well-known songs. The festival is well-known for its varied lineup of both local and international performers, and Nelly Furtado's performance was a highlight. She attracted a sizable audience of fans who sung along to every song and were captivated by her fascinating stage persona.

Nelly Furtado has played at renowned locations like the Hollywood Bowl in Los Angeles, the Barclays Center in New York, and the O2 Arena in London in addition to these events. She is a well-liked choice for music festivals and venues all over the world thanks to her ability to connect with her fans and give an amazing performance.

Overall, Nelly Furtado's appearances at events and festivals have enhanced her reputation as a gifted and admired pop musician. She has become a beloved personality in the music industry thanks to her distinctive sound and powerful stage presence, which have mesmerized audiences all over the world.

Throughout her career, Canadian musician Nelly Furtado has worked with many other musicians, but some of those relationships stand out more than others. "Promiscuous," a collaboration with Timbaland, is one among the most renowned. After a lengthy absence, Furtado was reintroduced to the public with this song, which was a big smash. The song's upbeat tempo and lighthearted lyrics wonderfully highlight Furtado's distinctive vocals. Here, Timbaland's production abilities are also clearly on display, resulting in a flawless fusion of hip hop and pop.

The song "Broken Strings," which features James Morrison, is another significant Furtado-related collaboration. This song exhibits Furtado's softer side and is a more somber ballad. Morrison's soulful vocals wonderfully balance Furtado's, resulting in a lovely duet that touches the heart. The two musicians give a powerful performance that is sure to hit a chord with fans, and the lyrics are emotive and honest.

While "Promiscuous" and "Broken Strings" are two of Furtado's most significant projects, there are other ones that are noteworthy. Another outstanding song that displays Furtado's musical sensibility and capacity for collaboration is "Give It To Me," which features Justin Timberlake and Timbaland. Beautiful Spanish-language track "Fotografia," with Juanes, demonstrates Furtado's range as a musician. Another song combining Timbaland and Soshy, "Morning After Dark," demonstrates both Timbaland's production prowess and Furtado's distinctive vocal style.

Nelly Furtado's success has largely been attributed to her partnerships with other musicians. Furtado has demonstrated her ability to collaborate with a range of musicians and produce music that connects with listeners all over the world with bouncy pop singles and heartfelt ballads.

What happened between Nelly Furtado and Timbaland?

After it was discovered that Nelly Furtado's 2007 single "Do It" contained parts from the chiptune-style composition "Acidjazzed Evening" by Finnish musician Janne Suni, tensions between Furtado and her producer Timbaland erupted.

What does Nelly Furtado do now?

Nelly Furtado is currently in Colombia recording new music and collaborating with Colombian artists.

When did Nelly Furtado come out?

She first became well-known because to her 2000 first album, Whoa, Nelly!, which featured the hit singles "I'm Like a Bird" and "Turn Off the Light."

Did Nelly Furtado have a baby?

In 2003, Nelly Furtado and her ex-boyfriend Jasper Gahunia welcomed a daughter they called Nevis. Two years later, they broke up, but they remained close friends and co-parents.

Who is Nelly Furtado's baby daddy?

In 2003, Nelly Furtado gave birth to a child with her then-boyfriend, Jasper Gahunia, who was well-known and successful in the music business at the time. Due to his talent, Gahunia is still working in the music business today.

Why did Nelly Furtado stop?

Nelly Furtado revealed that she had to end her career as a result of an onstage breakdown while on the road with her "Loose" tour in an interview with the Daily Mail in 2012. She required a break because she was worn out.

Is Nelly Furtado still making music?

"I have been making new music solid, nonstop for the last year the way I like to: late nights, space to create wildly, and loads of community and collaboration," Nelly tells Variety. "I am creating a pop record that is influenced by the music I enjoy. Dance is a theme in my album; I made a record with SG Lewis that I enjoy.

Does Nelly Furtado have a husband?

Nelly Furtado wed sound engineer Demacio Castellon on July 19, 2008, however the couple split up in the summer of 2016. Furtado declared her current status as a bachelorette in April 2017.

Are Nelly Furtado and Timbaland together?

Timbaland has formally acknowledged Nelly Furtado and him as a relationship, confirming that the reports of their engagement are accurate.

Why did Nelly Furtado leave music?

"I stopped juggling, but I didn't stop making music. I declared, "I'm going to wash my own underwear and clean my own toilet!"

Who did Nelly Furtado have a baby with?

In 2003, Nelly and her ex-boyfriend Jasper Gahunia welcomed their daughter Nevis. Two years later, they broke up, but they remained close friends and co-parents.

Who sings with Nelly Furtado say it right?

Nelly Furtado
